author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

The `edmConfigDump` put `cms.{}` for a Task when the Task had > 255 elements. This PR fixes the formatting. Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37837.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run. The configuration dump mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37837#issuecomment-1120726574 passes `python3`.
title: Fix dumpPython() for Task and ConditionalTask when they contain > 255 elements
